ComicInfo.Summary:
The Pathfinder heroes are plunged into danger as a new threat emerges in Magnimar. Ezren ambushed, Kyra targeted, Merisiel tempted by her past... Will the group endure? Come see why Pathfinder is the industry's best-selling fantasy tabletop game. Each issue features an EXCLUSIVE removable, playable tactical map and poster!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Genzoman | 1 | Var | Variant Cover | Carlos Ernesto Gomez & Ross Campbell | 2 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Sean Izaakse & Ross Campbell | 3 | LE | Ultra-Rare Limited Edition Cover | Steven Cummings & Ben Hunzeker | 4 | RE | Paizo.com Exclusive Cover | Steve Ellis | |
